titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the International Union of Operating Engineers Local 95 Records, 1946-1999 AIS.2003.01
titlestmt.author: Zachary Brodt.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-06-11 09:36:21 -0400.

did.unittitle: International Union of Operating Engineers Local 95 Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: International Union of Operating Engineers. Local 95 (Pittsburgh, Pa.)

did.abstract: International Union of Operating Engineers, Local 95 was chartered on March 24, 1902. Still in existence, the union represents operating engineers and stationary engineers that maintain large commercial, industrial, and institutional buildings in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. This collection contains membership application cards, correspondence, contracts and meeting minutes of International Union of Operating Engineers, Local 95.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of William T. Cagney, Business Manager of Local 95, in 2003.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The International Union of Operating Engineers was founded in 1896 and is currently a member of the AFL-CIO. The International Union not only represents heavy equipment operators and mechanics, but also members of the public sector and service industry. International Union of Operating Engineers Local 95 was chartered on March 24, 1902 and represents operating engineers and stationary engineers that maintain large commercial, industrial, and institutional buildings in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: International Union of Operating Engineers Local 95 Records, 1946-1999, AIS.2003.01, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: International Union of Operating Engineers Local 95 Records, 1946-1999, AIS.2003.01, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: An inventory to this collection was written by Zachary Brodt in May 2010.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: African American Construction Workers of Pittsburgh Photograph Collection, 1956-1987, AIS.2006.13, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This collection contains membership application cards, correspondence and meeting minutes of International Union of Operating Engineers Local 95. Also present is information regarding the National Institute for the Uniform Licensing of Power Engineers and the pursuit of state licensing legislation for boiler engineers. Contracts with various companies and buildings in Pittsburgh are also included.
